entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Forks
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow. High minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
